section.title: Network bonding issues
section.para: To troubleshoot network bonding issues, verify connection status, check the bonding interface's status, and restart network services using the nmcli command.

step.para: List and view status of connections:
Check the status of network devices, including the bonded interface.
Check the bonding interface status in /proc/net/bonding/bond0
This file provides information about the bonding mode, active slaves, and other relevant details.
If the connections are inactive, activate the connections:
Modify the connection if required.
Restart the connection.

section.title: Network teaming issues
section.para: Verify the error messages related to network teaming in /var/log/messages.

You can troubleshoot network teaming issues by analyzing the devices and team connection details, enabling the device if it is disabled, and modifying the bonding mode if required. After making any changes, reload the network team connection and restart NetworkManager.
